hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`id Al-Maqburi:That his father said, "While we were accompanying a funeral procession, Abu Huraira got hold of the hand of Marwan and they sat down before the coffin was put down. Then Abu Sa`id came and took hold of Marwan's hand and said, "Get up. By Allah, no doubt this (i.e. Abu Huraira) knows that the Prophet forbade us to do that." Abu Huraira said, "He (Abu Sa`id) has spoken the truth

chapter.ara-name: باب مَتَى يَقْعُدُ إِذَا قَامَ لِلْجَنَازَةِ
chapter.eng-name: when should one sit after standing for the funeral procession?
